title.text: Appendix II: Discussion Panel on Evaluation Research in Generation Moderator: Inderjeet Mani

abstractContent.text: Evaluation is critical in offering feedback on progress_toboth developers andpotential consumers of NLG technology.
However, evaluation has thus far not been as well-established in NLG as it has become in NLU.
This panel will discuss evaluation methods and resources.
It is aimed at building a better understanding of NLG evaluation methods, and hopefully arriving at steps to facilitate future evaluations.
